title: hmcl启动器1.5.2报错
author: Ivor_aif
txt_content:
报错内容如下：
      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      


Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game


A full error report has been saved to D:\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2019-06-17_21.38.13-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(






--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 86eda2f5 --------
Full report at:
D:\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2019-06-17_21.38.13-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!


Generated 19-6-17 下午9:38


-- System Details --
Details:

        Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1

谁知道怎么解决？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Ivor_aif 发表于 2019-6-17 22:43
下载不了
链接:https://pan.baidu.com/s/1479V7jpISsy5tNqUIn-Udg 提取码:n6ae 复制这段内容后打开百度网盘手机App，操作更方便哦

百度云试试
